title: Vice President Biden hosts conference calls with governors and local officials to discuss recovery act implementation 04-07-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 07, 2009

 



Vice President Biden hosts conference calls with governors and local officials to discuss recovery act implementation 04-07-09




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President  ____________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                             April 7, 2009 VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN HOSTS CONFERENCE CALLS   WITH GOVERNORS AND LOCAL OFFICIALS TO DISCUSS RECOVERY ACT IMPLEMENTATION  Earlier today, the Vice President hosted two conference calls with Governors and Mayors/County Executives from across the country to discuss Recovery Act implementation. The following elected officials participated: GOVERNORS  Governor John Baldacci (D-ME) Governor Don Carcieri (R-RI) Governor Jay Nixon (D-MO) Governor Sonny Perdue (R-GA) Governor Pat Quinn (D-IL)  MAYORS / COUNTY EXECUTIVES  Mayor Byron Brown (D-Buffalo, NY) Mayor Dwight Jones (D-Richmond, VA) Mayor Jim Newberry (D-Lexington KY) Mayor Robert Walkup (R-Tucson, AZ) Mayor Bill White (D-Houston TX) County Executive Russell Pry (D-Summit County, OH)
